text: The Fort Good Hope First Nation is a Dene First Nations band government in the Northwest Territories. The band's main community is Fort Good Hope. The Fort Good Hope First Nation is a member of the Sahtu Dene Council. Under the Sahtu Dene and Metis Comprehensive Land Claim Agreement, the First Nation shares title to 41,437 square kilometers of land in the Sahtu Region. ==References== Category:First Nations in the Northwest Territories Category:Dene governments
title: Fort Good Hope First Nation
